document.title: Accolades, Fall 2010

author.organization: College of Education, Health, and Human Sciences

document.abstract: The 2009â€“2010 academic year has proven to be one of great success and achievement for the College of Education, Health, and Human Sciences. As graduates and friends of our college, you will be pleased to know that we have achieved our capital campaign goal of $20 million. Although now well past our goal, we are working even harder to raise funds in support of our mission. This issue of Accolades is full of stories that demonstrate the progress you have made possible.
